titles.title: To adjust the designation of controlled airspace around the Dallas/Forth Worth Airport, Texas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: 10/5/1994--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to take appropriate action to adjust from seven miles to eight miles the controlled airspace boundary around the Dallas/Fort Worth Airport, Texas.
